results.title: Hot flashes and fatigue relieved by metformin.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To describe 3 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with long-standing @DISEASE_Hot_Flashes @DISEASE_MESH:D019584 @@@hot flashes@@@, excessive @<m>DISEASE_Sweat_Gland_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013543 @@@sweating@@@, and @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@ whose symptoms were ameliorated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Maudar V, Winters SJ, Villafuerte BC. Hot flashes and fatigue relieved by metformin. Endocr Pract. 2009 Jan-Feb;15(1):30-4. PMID: 19211394
citations.BibTeX: @article{19211394, title={Hot flashes and fatigue relieved by metformin.}, author={Maudar V and Winters SJ and Villafuerte BC}, journal={Endocr Pract}, volume={15}, number={1}, pages={30-4}}

results.title: A 37-Year-Old Man With Pleuritic Chest Pain.
results.text_hl: He denied @DISEASE_Fever @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@, but endorsed @DISEASE_Chills @DISEASE_MESH:D023341 @@@chills@@@ and night @<m>DISEASE_Sweat_Gland_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013543 @@@sweats@@@. His medications included @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_saxagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C502994 @@@saxagliptin@@@.

citations.NLM: Galant-Swafford J, Light M, Onaitis MW, Rawlings SA, Fierer J, Landsberg JW. A 37-Year-Old Man With Pleuritic Chest Pain. Chest. 2019 Jul;156(1):e15-e21. PMID: 31279380
